PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-13972011-12-01,  ,  ,  NRCAN,  NEB, 
ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectOrder approving the Variance of National Energy Board Certificate of Public Convenience and Necessity OC-1, OC-38, OC-41 and issuing OC-57
PrecisOrder approving the variation of Certificates OC-1, OC-38, and OC-41 by the National Energy Board in accordance with Amending Orders AO-2-OC-1, AO-1-OC-38 and AO-2-OC-41 as well as the issuance of certificate OC-57, in order to reflect the transfer of Line 13 pipeline and facilities from Enbridge Pipelines Inc. to ENBRIDGE SOUTHERN LIGHTS GP Inc., on behalf of Enbridge Southern Lights LP.
AttachmentsAttachment
